APS_DstBindAddr_t Union Reference

Detailed Description

Information about the destination address of a binding entry.

The APS binding table allows ZigBee devices to establish designated destination for frames from a given source endpoint and with a given cluster ID. See ZigBee spec. r18, 2.2.8.2, page 65.

Note:
A value of APS_DstBindAddr_t type should be in little-endian format.
